participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and thoughtful, he enjoys sharing his hobbies with his family.
participant_1.background: i am a stay at home dad. horror movies are my favorites. i spent a decade working in the human services field. my father used to work for home depot.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Creative and easy-going, she enjoys quiet activities that allow her to relax and express herself.
participant_2.background: i enjoy coloring books. i live is a rural farming community. i have a german shepherd dog. my husband is adopted.
